summary: Feature request to support custom_encoder parameter in get_route_handler and get_request_handler for optimal multimedia (msgpack/JSON) route handling with bytes fields.
symptoms: Cannot pass custom encoders to serialize_response for different mime types
Bytes fields serialized inefficiently between msgpack and base64
Need to override encoders for multimedia routes
suspected_root_cause: get_request_handler does not accept custom_encoder parameter, limiting flexibility for multimedia route implementations
